channel.title: Need help with clients for my friends
channel.description: just setting up a server for me and my friends to play on without anybody and i need help with setting their clients up. my client works and server is up and running but i need help with their cache and how to change the ip. in the picture i changed all of those and it didnt work so i was wondering what i should do? sorry im new to this.

item.title: Need help with clients for my friends
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

Yes, also, go to canyouseeme.org to test and see if your port is open.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with clients for my friends

item.title: Need help with clients for my friends
item.dc:creator: @nazzy_nazdel nazzy nazdel
item.description:
@nazzy_nazdel wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:5, topic:540608”][quote author=nazzy nazdel link=topic=659470.msg4410264#msg4410264 date=1393372656]

Make sure the port the client is trying to connect on is forwarded (try this site for portforwarding help) then change the client’s IP to your own (or your no-ip).
[/quote][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=659470.msg4410133#msg4410133 date=1393330481]
Make sure the port the client is trying to connect on is forwarded (try this site for portforwarding help) then change the client’s IP to your own (or your no-ip).

i have everything portforwarded its just whenever i change any ip it doesnt even load the server it stays at 0% but with 127.0.0.1 it loads.
[/quote]Then your ip isn’t portforwarded correctly.[/quote]

its port 43594 right?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with clients for my friends

Make sure the port the client is trying to connect on is forwarded (try this site for portforwarding help) then change the client’s IP to your own (or your no-ip).
[/quote]
i have everything portforwarded its just whenever i change any ip it doesnt even load the server it stays at 0% but with 127.0.0.1 it loads.[/quote]Then your ip isn’t portforwarded correctly.
